attributes.action: Remove the letter c from the English alphabet. Replace it with either k or s.
attributes.additional_details:
EG: place sounds the exact same to plase. And makes it much easier to spell. Cane also sounds the exact same to Kane and means the same thing.
In conclusion I see that the letter c has no use and it can be removed from the alfabet and it will be for the greater good of the people.
attributes.background: The letter c is useless and makes it harder for dislexic people to spell. Just think about it the letter c can always be replaced with either k or s and sound the exact same.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

If you're concerned about ensuring dyslexic people aren't disadvantaged in settings such as examinations, you might like to sign the following petition:

Review how children with dyslexia are assessed by the exam system
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325341
